message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase the product for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $8,750. This offer reflects the product's worth while still giving you a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $8,200? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my means.
